article.headline: Canisius 81, Hartford 71
article.story: WEST HARTFORD, Conn. (AP) -- Chuck Harris scored 22 points and Jovan Robinson added 21 to lead Canisius to an 81-71 win over Hartford Friday afternoon. The Golden Griffins (5-7) shot 56 percent and countered every Hartford run to control the game. Canisius led 38-34 at the break and after Hartford pulled to within two in the opening minutes of the second half, the Golden Griffins responded with an 11-2 run. Hartford (6-6) made another run at the visitors and pulled to 53-48, but Harris and Robinson combined for 17 of the next 19 points for Canisius. The Golden Griffins led by as many as 14 points down the stretch. Harris also finished with a game-high 10 rebounds and Frank Turner added 12 points and a game-high seven assists for Canisius. Bo Taylor led Hartford with a career-high 23 points. Rich Baker and Joe Zeglinski scored 11 points each for the Hawks.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
